alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN FOREST...CENTRAL MARINETTE...NORTHERN MENOMINEE...NORTHERN OCONTO AND CENTRAL LANGLADE COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from rivitz to 15 miles north of Antigo. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... McCaslin Mountain Natural Area around 530 PM CDT. Wausaukee around 540 PM CDT. White Lake around 550 PM CDT. Crivitz, Mountain, and Bear Paw Scout Camp around 600 PM CDT. Gardner Dam Scout Camp around 605 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Boot Lake Campground, Middle Inlet, Post Lake, Polar, Kempster, Upper Bass Lake, Silver Cliff, Choate, Peters Marsh Wildlife Area, and Lily. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Forest; Langlade; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County
